DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effect Corticosteroids Mylotarg速 Infusion-Related Adverse Events Patients With Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Patients CD33 positive , resistant relapse AML . Patients > 18 year age . ECOG performance status 02 . Fever ( > 38 ) , chill hypotension ( systolic BP < 105mmHg ) 48 hour precede therapy . Use corticosteroid , diphenhydramine acetaminophen within 24 hour enrollment . Participation Mylotarg速 protocol .
